### Question 1

(a)

```{r, echo=TRUE}
freq <- seq(0, 0.5, length.out = 100)

spectral_density <- rep(1/(2*pi), length(freq))

plot(freq,
     spectral_density, 
     xlab = "Frequency (cycles per unit time)", 
     ylab = "Spectral Density", 
     main = "Spectral Density Function for White Noise",
     type = "l")
```
